testcase.name: tag group update with non existing organizer
testcase.system-out: Given user creates request body for tag group update with non existing organizer.passed When user sends post request for tag group update with non existing organizer.passed Then user validates organizer not found error for tag group update with "404" status code.passed

testcase.name: tag group update when tag group does not exist
testcase.system-out: Given user creates request body with non existing tag group.................passed When When user sends post request with non existing tag group...............passed Then user validates tag group not found error with "404" status code........passed

testcase.name: tag group update when tag group does not link to organizer
testcase.system-out: Given user creates request body for tag group update which is not linked to organizer.passed When When user sends post request with tag group update request body is not linked to organizer.passed Then user validates tag group is not linked to organizer error with "409" status code for update ep.passed

testcase.name: tag group update when tag group is archived
testcase.system-out: Given user creates request body for with archived tag group.................passed When user sends post request with archived tag group........................passed Then user validates tag group is archived error with "409" status code for update ep.passed
